pullRequest.title: Add script fired events and add script inspector devtool

Relies on !96
Picture of the dev tool

Swing sucks and I suck at swing.

nodes.bodyText: this should probably hold the whole scriptevent

+package net.runelite.api.events;
+
+import lombok.Data;
+import net.runelite.api.widgets.Widget;
+
+/**
+ * An event that is fired before the designated script is ran
+ */
+@Data
+public class ScriptPreFired
+{
+	/**
+	 * The script id of the invoked script
+	 */
+	private final int scriptId;
+
+	/**
+	 * The source of the script invoke, this will be null unless
+	 */
+	private Widget source = null;

commit.message: rl-api: add invoke and return opcodes

nodes.bodyText: Name these in ScriptID so they're not magic numbers.
